## Description {#details}

Debug location.

A debug location in source code, used for debug info and otherwise.

Uses the SubclassData1, SubclassData16 and SubclassData32 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> slots.

Definition at line 1988 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### cloneByMultiplyingDuplicationFactor() {#ae79e1d26012dca43293dea8a19fc002b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; const DILocation &#42; &gt; llvm::DILocation::cloneByMultiplyingDuplicationFactor (unsigned DF) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> with duplication factor <code>DF</code> &#42; current duplication factor encoded in the discriminator.

The current duplication factor is as defined by <a href="#a2e9ddde31c78bb0a6f70246eac6c648f">getDuplicationFactor()</a>. Returns std::nullopt if encoding failed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l02150">2150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### cloneWithBaseDiscriminator() {#a839785a42c232b11d0e1b6b6c0ddba69}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; const DILocation &#42; &gt; llvm::DILocation::cloneWithBaseDiscriminator (unsigned BD) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> with updated base discriminator <code>BD</code>.

Only the base discriminator is set in the new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a>, the other encoded values are elided. If the discriminator cannot be encoded, the function returns std::nullopt.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l02133">2133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### encodeDiscriminator() {#a6878171e0bb76ddb464e30b5bad4952f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; DILocation::encodeDiscriminator (unsigned BD, unsigned DF, unsigned CI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Raw encoding of the discriminator.

APIs such as cloneWithDuplicationFactor have certain special case behavior (e.g. treating empty duplication factor as the value &#39;1&#39;). This API, in conjunction with cloneWithDiscriminator, may be used to encode the raw values provided.

<code>BD:</code> base discriminator <code>DF:</code> duplication factor <code>CI:</code> copy index

The return is std::nullopt if the values cannot be encoded in 32 bits - for example, values for BD or DF larger than 12 bits. Otherwise, the return is the encoded value.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l02221">2221</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp/#l00248">248</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp">DebugInfoMetadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Return the masked discriminator value for an input discrimnator value D (i.e.

zero out the (B+1)-th and above bits for D (B is 0-base).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l02177">2177</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMergedLocation() {#a78cc51c415c7e64b5efe2c8458fbd35a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DILocation &#42; DILocation::getMergedLocation (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42; LocA, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42; LocB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
When two instructions are combined into a single instruction we also need to combine the original locations into a single location.

When the locations are the same we can use either location. When they differ, we need a third location which is distinct from either. If they share a common scope, use this scope and compare the line/column pair of the locations with the common scope:
<ul>
<li>if both match, keep the line and column;</li>
<li>if only the line number matches, keep the line and set the column as 0;</li>
<li>otherwise set line and column as 0. If they do not share a common scope the location is ambiguous and can&#39;t be represented in a line entry. In this case, set line and column as 0 and use the scope of any location.</li>
</ul>


<code>LocA</code> <code>LocB:</code> The locations to be merged.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l02166">2166</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp/#l00121">121</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp">DebugInfoMetadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMergedLocations() {#a30a7ce961d5d90ff2fb6c9cee4576e5a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DILocation &#42; DILocation::getMergedLocations (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42; &gt; Locs)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Try to combine the vector of locations passed as input in a single one.

This function applies <a href="#a78cc51c415c7e64b5efe2c8458fbd35a">getMergedLocation()</a> repeatedly left-to-right.

<code>Locs:</code> The locations to be merged.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l02172">2172</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp">DebugInfoMetadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
